description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. They came from the ground. They brought a bouncy ball...and they bounced it around. This game is a unique twist on volleyball; it's fast & loose, and you can cross over to push your opponent around.
